title.narrative: Sustainable Development of the Ecuadorian Amazon: Integrated Management of Multiple Use Landscapes and High Value Conservation Forests

description.narrative:
1. Strengthened multi-level governance framework for sustainable management and production in multiple use landscapes (MUL) and high value conservation forests (HCVF) in the Special Amazonian Territorial Circumscription (CTEA)
,2. Access to markets, credit and incentives for sustainable production of the main products in multiple use and high conservation value landscapes of the CTEA
,3. Landscape level implementation of sustainable practices in commercial production and livelihoods systems, aligned with the conservation and restoration of HVCF ,4. Dissemination of Lessons-learned, monitoring evaluation
,Project Management Cost

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Agriculture, Livestock, Aquaculture and Fisheries (MAGAP) and Ministry of Environment (MAE)
